short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to easily scroll a web page up or down with adjustable speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that allows you to easily scroll a web page down with adjustable speed. If you want to scroll down a page but doesn't want to do manual scrolling, this extension is perfect for you. 

Skim a document, read the first tweet of a user by using Easy Scrolldown.
